q: of the obtuse and esoteric references department: Donald Rumsfeld 's adorable`` didn't know'' shenanigans reminded this columnist of the opening of`` The Hunter S. Thompson Sleep,'' when Carmen Sternwood falls backwards. Philip Marlowe says: I had to catch her or let her crack her head on the tessellated floor. The mainstream media does for Donald Rumsfeld what Marlowe did for Carmen by unquestioningly accepting his disingenuous explanations.`` Good boy, Rover!'' sale next year. The company also is working on natural gas vehicles and will lead the field in offering 8- and 9-speed transmissions, designed for use with hybrids, in a wide range of vehicles. By 2013 we will have one of the most fuel-efficient fleets, Sergio Marchionne said Wednesday in announcing a demonstration fleet of up to 20 hydraulic hybrid Chrysler Town& Country minivans. Fuel economy on the minivans should improve 60 percent in city driving and 30 percent to 35 percent overall.
